channel.title: development policy on underWater desert Blogging
channel.description: Recent content in development policy on underWater desert Blogging

item.title: Why I Started Watershed Legal Services: My Journey from Expat Aid Worker to Expat Entrepreneur
item.description: I felt the need to justify (perhaps mostly to myself) why I have started what to many are a fantastically crazy journey of starting a socially-conscious law firm in a very undeveloped country. Here's why I made that decision.

item.title: On NGO Marketing
item.description: Last week our business wanted to set up a booth at the Hargesia Trade Fair but the booths were sold out when we applied. When we visited the fair, however, what we found was mostly NGOs. So what is the point of NGOs marketing here in Hargeisa?
